pullRequest.title: bugfix: clean root context when state machine inst record failed
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ⅰ. Describe what this PR did
fixbug: SAGA模式在创建状态机实例，在存入数据库时，出现异常时，移除 xid和branchType，避免影响其他事务执行
Ⅱ. Does this pull request fix one issue?

fixed #3312

Ⅴ. Special notes for reviews

commit.message: bugfix: clean rootcontext when state machine inst record failed
optimize: use duplicate key to mock exp

nodes.bodyText: How to ensure that this unit test is executed last, otherwise it will cause other unit tests to fail
